description: Imports data from a MySQL database.

input.name: hostname
input.description:
The hostname or the IP address or the database server.
If unspecified, defaults to "localhost".

input.name: port
input.description:
The port of the database server.
If unspecified, defaults to 3306.

input.name: username
input.description:
The username to connect to the database.
If unspecified, defaults to "root".

input.name: password
input.description: The password to connect to the database.

input.name: query
input.description: The SQL query reading from the database (e.g. `SELECT * from table WHERE ...`).

output.name: data
output.description: A datatable containing the imported data.
